meanings.definition: A verbal, written, or recorded communication sent from one person or group to another.
meanings.sent1: I received many messages on my phone today.
meanings.sent2: The postman delivers messages to our house every day.
meanings.sent3: The messages in the bottle washed ashore and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sent messages of joy to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The messages in the sky were written by the clouds in a secret code.

meanings.definition: An underlying theme or idea conveyed in a work of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: The artist's painting conveyed deep messages about nature.
meanings.sent2: The messages in the novel were subtle but powerful.
meanings.sent3: The messages hidden in the music made the audience ponder.
meanings.sent4: His poetry carried messages of love and loss.
meanings.sent5: The messages in the play resonated with the audience long after the curtains closed.
